title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.7 - Approval of starter
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.7 - Approval of starter

State Regulations
A horse which has never started behind a starting gate in
a race shall not be permitted to start in any race with or without purse
(including qualifying races) unless such horse has been schooled and has been
approved for racing by a recognized starter, and such approval has been
recorded on the eligibility papers of such horse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4113.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
